Chordate/Smokescreen:



Chordate entered the bridge, looking over to Smokescreen.  "Thanks for taking 
over, I can handle it now."

"Alright.  No problem." Smokescreen replied, quickly telling Chordate what 
happened, and then left for his quarters.

---

Chordate sat down at the terminal Smokescreen had been at.  It felt good to 
get back to his ol' job.  He watched Rex carrying Brightblade towards a CR 
chamber.  If she tried anything, he would take her down.  And if anything 
happened in the brig, motion detectors would tell him.
